pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gavv (2024, TV show)$(br)Health: 200

Has a 5% chance to spawn from a blue or white $(l:gavv/mobs/agent)Agent$(/l)$(br2)Special moves:$(li)Transforms into $(l:gavv/riders/bitter_gavv#bakibaki_stick)Kamen Rider Bitter Gavv Bakibaki Stick Form$(/l) at under 100 health if you have $(l:gavv/items/mimic_keys#shiita_mimic_key)Shiita's Mimic Key$(/l) in your inventory$(br2)Drops$(li)1 $(l:gavv/items/mimic_keys#jeeb_mimic_key)Jeeb's Mimic Key$(/l)$(li)1-3 $(l:gavv/items/heatpress)Hitpresses$(/l) (50%)$(li)1-2 $(l:gavv/items/granute_tooth)Granute Teeth$(/l) (50%)
